description: Karisu is the reincarnation of a Dragon God Clan member who was killed during the clan`s war against the Dragon Demon Clan. After being reborn, she lived in Tarutarp Village for sixteen years when it was attacked Demon Devil Clan and her identity was revealed. Upon the attack her foster mother was killed and she left to report the attack to the capital with http://anidb.net/ch98779 [an aspiring dragon knight].
name: Karisu
